The Engine of
Sovereign AI

High-performance inference optimized for consumer hardware. Run state-of-the-art models without the cloud tax.

KTransformers

Server-side inference engine optimized for heterogeneous computing. Run DeepSeek-V3 and other massive models on limited GPU memory by leveraging CPU RAM efficiently.

  • 30x Lower Latency vs Standard CPU Inference
  • Hybrid CPU/GPU Offloading
  • Drop-in OpenAI API Compatibility
pip install ktransformers

Omnix Edge

Bring intelligence to the edge. Run optimized models on iPhone, MacBook, and NPU-enabled devices with minimal battery drain.

  • Metal & CoreML Optimization
  • Local-First Privacy
  • Zero-Latency Offline Mode
